answers.text: A Virtual Private Gateway sits at the edge of the VPC and connects to VPN connections from on-premises data centers or networks.
A Virtual Private Gateway is used to connect two VPCs in two different AWS accounts to one another.
A Virtual Private Gateway connects two VPCs together in a secure fashion.
A Virtual Private Gateway is used to connect two separate on-premises data centres or networks to each other.
